title: AI Technical Documentation Standard
description: This standard defines requirements for creating and maintaining comprehensive technical documentation for high-risk AI systems in compliance with EU AI Act Article 11 and Annex IV.

kpis.name: Documentation Completeness
kpis.definition: % of high-risk AI with complete Annex IV documentation
kpis.measurementMethod: (# high-risk AI with complete docs / # high-risk AI) × 100

kpis.name: Review Completion
kpis.definition: % of annual reviews completed on time

kpis.name: Authority Response Time
kpis.definition: Average days to respond to authority requests

kpis.name: Approval Cycle Time
kpis.definition: Average days from submission to approval

kpis.name: Documentation Quality Score
kpis.definition: Average quality score across all documentation

kpis.name: Version Control Compliance
kpis.definition: % of documentation with proper version control
kpis.measurementMethod: (# docs with version control / # total docs) × 100

kpis.name: Update Timeliness
kpis.definition: % of documentation updates completed within 30 days

kpis.name: Access Control Compliance
kpis.definition: % of documentation with proper access controls
kpis.measurementMethod: (# docs with access controls / # total docs) × 100
